document.full_text: roster depth is typically disregarded as a legitimate playoff advantage for n.b.a. teams, but the hawks and grizzlies each lost game 5 in their respective series because of the heavy minutes their starters are forced to play.
document.title: hawks, grizzlies demonstrates value of depth
lines_and_colors: roster depth is typically disregarded as a legitimate playoff advantage for n.b.a. teams, but the hawks and grizzlies each lost game 5 in their respective series because of the heavy minutes their starters are forced to play.
